text: Crimson Peak is a 2015 gothic romance movie directed by Guillermo del Toro and written by del Toro and Matthew Robbins. The movie stars Mia Wasikowska, Tom Hiddleston, Jessica Chastain, Charlie Hunnam, and Jim Beaver. ==References== Category:2015 romance movies Category:American romance movies Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Guillermo del Toro
title: Crimson Peak
